Notes

First of all, a huge applause for 'agentofheart' for bringing us such a pretty source in the opening weekend of a movie release.

To start with, the only annoying thing here was the logo placed at left bottom of the frame, we've removed it; not cropped, but removed.
Source was blocky in few scenes, so we did a minimal deblocking in order to increase visual clarity in fast paced scenes without washing off the details or blurring the frames.
Brought out fine details present beneath the flat surface.
Adjusted luma; whites were pretty heavy, increased blacks in order to add depth to the frames.
Lastly, removed the brownish-green tinge & adjusted the red beneath it.

Also, we've tagged it as 'DVDScr', because this is a true screener! Enjoy till retail.

DDR. Quality. Forever.
